name: NEOGEO BATTLE COLISEUM
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) NeoGeo Special Cast unleashes this tag-team versus fighter. In addition to original heroes and heroines, it features a host of unique characters that transcend time; armed with weapons and robots warriors from both old and new titles of the once dominant NeoGeo platform have been amassed under one roof. We are proud to present the Xbox LIVE Arcade version, featuring both character and background graphics redone in high definition. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
